metadata.title: CVE-2022-1488 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Extensions API in Google Chrome prior to101.0.4951.41 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to leak cross-origin data via a crafted ChromeExtension.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
